channel.title: [317][PI] TurmoilX Development Team - Need Client Coders [PI][317]
channel.description:
Hello I'm Gypsy owner of Turmoilx. We are a 317 PI Based server. We desperately need java proficient client coders. I am open to letting anyone who can get the job done for me. We already have some dedicated players but I Would like to improve the server a lot.
Requirements:
-Mature -Ventrilo with a Microphone -Experience with Java -Experience coding PI -Experience coding clients
Contact me on msn: gypsy.mm@live.com
Evidence:
Amazing combat Fully functional clan chat Lootshare Custom Coded, 100% God Wars Amazing npc drop system Fight Pits Pest Control Barrows Fight Caves All Skills Work Potions 100% Food 100% 100% Potion dose mixing Base for skill menus Piety + chivalry Perfect prayer draining Custom infinity/mage book minigame Working obelisks Perfect prayer draining and protection prayer delay in pvp Quick Chat
Login Screen: [img]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/9455/loginmx.png[/img]
Here is a preview of PVP: [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/o02xxz.jpg[/img] Some pictures of godwars:
Teleport to interface to GWD: [img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/5599/gwdinterface.jpg[/img] In the waiting room for bandos: [img]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/4078/gwdwaitingroom.jpg[/img] Fighting inside GWD: [img]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/3286/gwdbanod1.jpg[/img] [img]http://img121.imageshack.us/img121/5369/gwadbandos2.jpg[/img]
Fighting Saradomin GWD [img]http://img704.imageshack.us/img704/2654/gwdsara1.jpg[/img] Finishing up Saradomin GWD [img]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/7245/gwdsarawaitingroom.jpg[/img]
Armadyl GWD [img]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/5008/gwdarmadyl1.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/2621m3p.jpg[/img]
